Interface ServiceProviderBuilder<T>

public interface ServiceProviderBuilder<T>

Method Summary
 ServiceProvider<T> build()

          optional - set the provider strategy.
 ServiceProviderBuilder<T> refreshPaddingMs(int refreshPaddingMs)
          optional To avoid herding in noisy scenarios, the cache should be padded to only update 1 per period.

          required - set the name of the service to be provided

optional - set the provider strategy. The default is RoundRobinStrategy

refreshPaddingMs

ServiceProviderBuilder<T> refreshPaddingMs(int refreshPaddingMs)
optional To avoid herding in noisy scenarios, the cache should be padded to only update 1 per period. The refresh padding is that period in milliseconds. Set to 0 to turn off padding. The default is 1 second.

Parameters:
refreshPaddingMs - padding in milliseconds
Returns:
this
